name: VINCE
text:
So... this is it, boys and girls. Final hand. Stakes are set.
One winner takes the pot... and maybe a little more.

name: LORA
text: You sure you want in on this, Isaac? You’ve lost more than just money in places like this.

name: ISAAC
text: And yet... I’m still sitting here.

name: VINCE
text: Let’s play. Cards down. Eyes up.
